newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Best offer in Taiwan jet fuel tender around $265/T.
newsitem.headline: Best offer in Taiwan jet fuel tender around $265/T.

text.p: The lowest offer in Taiwan's Chinese Petroleum Corp's jet fuel import tender for February was around $265 per tonne, traders said on Tuesday.
The tender sought 32,000 tonnes of aviation jet fuel for February 15-28 delivery on a cost-and-freight (c-and-f) basis to Shen Ao or Keelung and closed on January 13.
It attracted a total of 14 offers.
CPC would award the tender later today, a CPC source said.
In its last tender, CPC bought one 32,000-tonne cargo for second half January delivery at around $270 per tonne, c-and-f basis.
